# Heap Buffer Overflow (READ: 1786) in exif_iif_add_value

## Report Details
- **Report ID**: 344035
- **URL**: https://hackerone.com/reports/344035
- **State**: Closed
- **Severity**: medium
- **Submitted**: 2018-04-27T16:12:39.274Z
- **Disclosed**: 2018-06-01T18:40:35.034Z

## Reporter
- **Username**: cy1337
- **Name**: N/A

## Team
- **Name**: N/A
- **Handle**: ibb

## Vulnerability Information
The exif_read_data() function is prone to an out of bounds read while processing crafted JPG data.  This was discovered using AFL.

It can be reproduced as follows:
USE_ZEND_ALLOC=0 php -r 'exif_read_data("data://text/plain;base64,");'

## Impact

A context dependent attacker could potentially gain sensitive information about a PHP environment or cause segmentation faults. This could be used as part of a larger exploit chain to achieve code execution through another vulnerability.

No attachments
